name: Crystal Fragments
description: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing 2483 Magic Damage. Your next non-Ultimate ability cast within 3 seconds costs 10% less.  Casting a Magicka ability has a 35% chance of causing your next Crystal Fragments to be instant, deal 66% more damage, and cost 50% less Magicka.
effectLines: Casting Magicka abilities has a chance to make your next Crystal Fragments instant, deal more damage, and cost less.
coefDescription: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing $1 Magic Damage. Your next non-Ultimate ability cast within 3 seconds costs 10% less.  Casting a Magicka ability has a 35% chance of causing your next Crystal Fragments to be instant, deal 66% more damage, and cost 50% less Magicka.
